metadata.synopsis: A handful of PAD's to help explain the rules of the combat in the Undercity ruins better.- A simple comment to help emphasise that the combat is over, even though it hasn't finished yet (it'll play as they begin to "Poof" offstage)- The Farslayer has started casting his magic spell- Combat has started and we want the player to know there's one particularly deadly opponent - the Farslayer.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The red ghost's enraging the others. If he falls, the others will too.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: It's over. They were nothing but dust without Bhaal's rage to fill them.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Hells - I can feel the spell crackling from here. Destroy him!
